remarks: Binary relationship form of the cartesian product operator. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
brcart.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
brcart.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
brcart.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
brcart $p |- ( <. A , B >. Cart C <-> C = ( A X. B ) ) $.
